function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in chlorine dose in drinking water distribution","Impact":"Potential generation of Disinfection-By-Products (DBP) and increased chemical costs, challenges in maintaining water quality in storage tanks","Mitigation":"Implement continuous monitoring and adjustment, use additional artificial intelligence (AI) support systems","Technologies":"Continuous monitoring systems, artificial intelligence (AI) support systems","People":"Public administrations, water utilities","Owner":"Water practitioners, water utility managers"},{"Description":"Changes in water consumption patterns","Impact":"Challenges in maintaining water quality in storage tanks","Mitigation":"Implement continuous monitoring and adjustment, use additional artificial intelligence (AI) support systems","Technologies":"Continuous monitoring systems, artificial intelligence (AI) support systems","People":"Water utilities, water utility managers","Owner":"Water practitioners"}]}
